mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TD_TENANT_TAGS_COUNT ( tenant_id, project_id, crowd_id, run_date, tag_code, tag_name, metric_value, cycle_statistics, start_date, end_date ) VALUES
( #{item.tenantId}, #{item.projectId}, #{item.crowdId}, #{item.runDate}, #{item.tagCode}, #{item.tagName}, #{item.metricValue}, #{item.cycleStatistics}, #{item.startDate}, #{item.endDate} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE metric_value = VALUES(metric_value)
mapper.update:
update TD_TENANT_TAGS_COUNT set
tenant_id=#{tenantId},
project_id=#{projectId},
crowd_id=#{crowdId},
run_date=#{runDate},
tag_code=#{tagCode},
tag_name=#{tagName},
metric_value=#{metricValue},
cycle_statistics=#{cycleStatistics},
start_date=#{startDate},
end_date=#{endDate},
where id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from TD_TENANT_TAGS_COUNT where tenant_id=#{tenantId} and project_id=#{projectId} and crowd_id=#{crowdId} and run_date=#{runDate} and cycle_statistics=#{cycleStatistics} and start_date=#{startDate} and end_date=#{endDate}
mapper.select: SELECT s.tenant_id, s.crowd_id, s.tag_code, s.tag_name, s.cycle_statistics, s.start_date, s.end_date, SUM(IFNULL(s.metric_value,0)) AS metric_value FROM TD_TENANT_TAGS_COUNT s WHERE s.project_id IN ( SELECT r.project_id FROM TD_PROJECT_RELATION r WHERE r.project_parent_id = #{projectId}) AND s.run_date = #{runDate} GROUP BY s.tenant_id, s.crowd_id, s.tag_code, s.tag_name, s.cycle_statistics, s.start_date, s.end_date
mapper.delete: delete from TD_TENANT_TAGS_COUNT where project_id = #{projectId} and run_date = #{runDate}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO TD_TENANT_TAGS_COUNT(tenant_id, project_id, crowd_id, run_date, tag_code, tag_name, metric_value, cycle_statistics, start_date, end_date) SELECT t.tenant_id, d.project_id, c.crowd_id, t.run_date, t.tag_code, t.tag_name, t.metric_value, t.cycle_statistics, t.start_date, t.end_date FROM (SELECT s.tenant_id, s.type, s.run_date, s.tag_code, s.tag_name, s.cycle_statistics, s.start_date, s.end_date, SUM(IFNULL(s.metric_value,0)) AS metric_value FROM (SELECT DISTINCT tb.tenant_id, cd.type, tb.run_date, tb.tag_code, tb.tag_name, tb.cycle_statistics, tb.start_date, tb.end_date, tb.metric_value, tb.project_id FROM TD_TENANT_TAGS_COUNT tb JOIN TD_CROWD cd ON tb.project_id = cd.attr1 AND tb.crowd_id = cd.id WHERE tb.project_id IN ( SELECT r.project_id FROM TD_PROJECT_RELATION r WHERE r.project_parent_id = #{projectId}) AND tb.run_date = #{runDate} )s GROUP BY s.tenant_id, s.type, s.run_date, s.tag_code, s.tag_name, s.cycle_statistics, s.start_date, s.end_date )t, (SELECT DISTINCT project_parent_id AS project_id FROM TD_PROJECT_RELATION WHERE project_parent_id = #{projectId} )d, (SELECT DISTINCT id AS crowd_id, type, attr1 FROM TD_CROWD )c WHERE c.attr1 = d.project_id AND c.type = t.type
